thread.title: Intimate Saint Sulpice
thread.title_full: Intimate Saint Sulpice - Review of Hotel Recamier, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: elber2
title: Intimate Saint Sulpice
text:
This is a small hotel tucked away in a corner of Plae Saint Sulpice. There is nothing particularly amazing about this hotel, nothing to make it truly stand out. However, it is tastefully furnished, charming, with a friendly accueil, it has a nice location, and prices are reasonable.
Rooms range from very small to medium-sized, and quite a few face an interior courtyard. Yet all of them have an attention to detail with nice sheets, drapes, and tapestries. Beds are good as well. A complementary tea is offered in the afternoon.
Alothether, a well-managed, elegant little hotel in one of Paris' nicest neighborhoods.
